item.title: Littering outside 7 Academy Buildings WGC, 26th November
item.description:
Hi there For the past several weeks there has been bags of rubbish outside of 7 Academy Buildings (WGC). I work from this office space and have noticed it. Can this please be removed?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Fanshaw Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights not on after 6am for at least a week., 26th November
item.description:
No street lights on early in the morning. Its winter, it’s dark. Please put them on like other side roads in the area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Versailles Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car, 26th November
item.description:
We are limited in parking as it is as one neighbour wants to park all 5 vehicles on top of that this abandoned car has been parked for more than 3 weeks. No one knows whose it is.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lincoln Close, North End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on side wall, 26th November
item.description:
I reported this under FixMyStreet ref: 8458231 and you told me it had been fixed and sorted . It has not been cleaned someone needs to come out now asap and clear it..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Occupation Road, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vandalised and fallen trees. Still not fixed, 26th November
item.description:
This is a follow up on Report ref: 8281457. This still hasn't been resolved, despite receiving notification on 11/11/25 that is has. The fallen tree has been left where it is.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hazel Drive, Slade Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole, 26th November
item.description:
On Chaville Way adjacent to traffic lights heading towards Finchley Central station there is a massive pothole causing great disruption to traffic flow which is quite concerning for at least 8 weeks now. Please forward this to Issues can be reported direct to TfL via: https://tfl.gov.uk/ help-and-contact/ contact-us-about-streets-and-other-road-issues You can also contact TFL directly by: Telephone – 0343 222 1234 Email – customerservices@tfl.gov.uk Apparently its not Barnet Council responsibility
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chaville Way, Church End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lions close, 26th November
item.description:
Street light H154 not working only comes on for half hour at dusk then switches off. Street in complete darkness
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lions Close, Chinbrook, Greater London

item.title: Trip hazards, 26th November

item.title: No street lights, 26th November
item.description:

item.title: Manhole covers are rocking, 26th November
item.description:

item.title: Vandalism on tgo equipment, 26th November
item.description:
The local TGO the great outdoors gym company equipment is damaged and needs repairs Also maybe adding more equipment would help as when training in groups of 3 plus we have to wait fairly long before being able to use the gym equipment

item.title: Traffic and speeding, 26th November
item.description:
Newlands Park needs to have a weight restriction in place to stop all the artic Lorries seeing as there has been a problem in the past with the road sinking and needing resurfacing. Speed camera need to be placed at mid points to stop speeding cars. 1 car came down the road today and must of been doing 70mph.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newlands Park, Perry Vale, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaf clearing required, 26th November
item.description:
Ref:8459252. Please note that the Brunswick leaf-clearing has not yet been completed (as of 25.11.25 - 1330hrs) This is contrary to your report of 09.56 Tuesday (25.11.25) so this case is not yet 'Closed' as stated. Please ask your team to re-visit Brunswick Quay,SE16 7PZ asap. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brunswick Quay, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
